title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: Cypherpunk Now "Bitcoin Meteorite Skateboard"More info: https://www.cypherpunknow.com/bitcoin-meteorite-skateboard/STARTING BID: 0.0150BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.0002BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: NOVEMBER 14th, 2022, 13:00:00 PST**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Very cool! Is this the one that was on display at the 2021 conference?

comments.author: geophphreigh
comments.body: Wow , love it. What a great item. I will open the bidding at 0.0150BTCFrom what I can tell this is a 8.125 board based on the photo and the board specifications circled here: Please correct me if I'm wrong MJ. As a side note, these clearly come in different colors. I am not sure if they correspond to deck size, but I have an 8.125 in green and this seems to be the same size in yellow, so ?. The photos on the website show an 8.25 in red/maroon. I have not confirmed with Martin regarding all possible colors/sizes, this auction is obviously yellow, and I have green, hm. . . . . I am curious if anyone has seen other deck colors.   Great item, very cool to see one up for auction. Geo
